{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Alice |model=WLAN 4421 |revision=(IAD) |asin= |fcc_date= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=ARV7506PW11 |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |pcb_id=141750620000J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 50702;PSB 50702 E, (XWAY DANUBE); |cpu1_cspeed=333 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S12D40ETP-G6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3060F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306G |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter;Lantiq;PEF 4268;Lantiq, PEF 4268 T, V1.2;2; |flags=ADSL2+, VoIP, FXS |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ALICE-WLANXX |default_ssid_regex=^ALICE-WLAN[0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:1C:28 |oui_eth=00:1C:28 }} :[https://static.dsl.o2online.de/selfcare/content/staticcontentblob/kundencenter/18900410/2012-01-11-20-13-48/data/Handbuch_Alice_WLAN_4421.pdf Manual (DE)]
"P/N: 141750620000J R01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] ARV7506PW11
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv7506 ''Arcadyan ARV7506PW11'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :Model: [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/alice/iad4421 Alice IAD WLAN 4421] / [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/o2/box4421 o2 Box 4421]
Per the manual, the default SSID appears to be '''ALICE-WLANXX''' :where '''XX''' is some number (appears to be non-hex). The OUI used may be (or include) 00:1C:28.
